body_html:
If you edit the docstring for nn.NLLLoss here, the changes will be reflected at our documentation website.

You can preview a copy on your computer by cd-ing into pytorch/docs and running make html.
body_text:
If you edit the docstring for nn.NLLLoss here, the changes will be reflected at our documentation website.
You can preview a copy on your computer by cd-ing into pytorch/docs and running make html.
body:
If you edit the docstring for nn.NLLLoss [here](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/c3a02fd8ed443f9d7cb2ee671f6241940074bd70/torch/nn/modules/loss.py#L88-L130), the changes will be reflected at our documentation website.

You can preview a copy on your computer by cd-ing into `pytorch/docs` and running `make html`.
